projects.title: Post Composer
projects.about: This app allows you to preview markdown code in real time. It also renders LaTeX (using Math-Jax) and code blocks (using PrismJS).

projects.title: The All-American Quote Machine
projects.about: This site aggregates and presents several curated quotes from notable American presidents, scientists, captains of industry, literary figures, and much more! If you find a quote that you'd like to share, you can share it easily via Twitter.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe in React!
projects.about: This is the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe built using the React framework. The game uses a recursive algorithm to play perfectly, but has a chance to blunder a move to give the player a fighting chance!

projects.title: SC2 Stream Tracker
projects.about: Track whether some of the most prolific Starcraft 2 Game Casts are online and visit their streams at the click of your mouse.

projects.title: Pomodoro Clock
projects.about: A pomodoro clock is a very useful tool for effective time managment. This particular interface for such a clock is readable and easy to use.

projects.title: Polynomial Regression Playground
projects.about: This site uses the AI to approximate a polynomial function that conforms to custom, user-generated data. I'd be happy to go into an in depth explanation of how it works during a personal interview.

articles.title: Project Euler - Problem 15 - Solution Explained
articles.about: The "Lattice paths" problem required that I use permutations to understand it, and combination math to solve it.
articles.author: Adil S. Iqbal

articles.title: Project Euler - Problem 14 - Solution Explained
articles.about: We grapple with the Collatz Conjecture. "Optimization" is the name of the game!
articles.author: Adil S. Iqbal

articles.title: Time Complexity, Part 2: Notation Station
articles.about: We build some of the vocabulary necessary to talk about how the runtime of our algorithms scale with ever-increasing datasets.
articles.author: Adil S. Iqbal

articles.title: Time Complexity, Part 1: Intro to Big-O
articles.about: Here, we begin a series of articles that will take a simple, yet in-depth look at Big-O notation.
articles.author: Adil S. Iqbal

articles.title: Project Euler - Problem 12 - Solution Explained
articles.about: In this article, we dive into the interesting world of triangular numbers and their factors.
articles.author: Adil S. Iqbal
